title: Devil's Note
description: When pastor and televangelist, Bela Bigelow, accepts a challenge from a heavy metal singer named Gorr, he begins a deal with the devil from which he may never escape.With God on his side, Bela believes he will win against the forces of darkness.But if Gorr wins the wager, Bela will become the first and only televangelist for Satan!
author: Rob Bliss
